main.head: Mario Monti: Italians divided over man touted as next prime minister – video
main.p: This article is more than 13 years old

As Italy's senate prepares to vote on austerity measures demanded by the European Union, Italians on the streets of Rome give their verdict on former EU commissioner Mario Monti, the man tipped to follow Silvio Berlusconi as the next PM
